channel.title: How can i ban items from ::ite/::pickup
channel.description: ok so i made rares phats masks pumpkin all that kinda stuff holiday items rare with a high price but some of my admins keep spawning them and i want to make it so they cant spawn rares. ty in advanced

item.title: How can i ban items from ::ite/::pickup
item.dc:creator: @SourSoul SourSoul
item.description:
@SourSoul wrote:

Your server can crash at anytime. It depends on what memory version you’re running on. That’s why most people delete the commands, It’s a total waste of time.

Read full topic

item.description:
@philip_l_g wrote:

forget all that make the item you want to ban delete when they use it like this:

if (command.startsWith("pickup 0995") && playerRights <= 2) { deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),9999999999); }

Read full topic
item.source: How can i ban items from ::ite/::pickup

item.title: How can i ban items from ::ite/::pickup
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

just search for pickup intill you get

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2)
		{
			try
			{
				int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
				int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
				if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0)
				{
					addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
				}
				else
				{
					sendMessage("No such item.");
				}
			}
			catch(Exception e)
			{
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10");
			}
		}

replace that ALL with

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2)
		{
			try
			{
				int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
				int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
				if (newItemID == 1038 || newItemID == 1039 || newItemID == 1040 || newItemID == 1041 || newItemID == 1042 || newItemID == 1043 || newItemID == 1044 || newItemID == 1045 || newItemID == 1046 || newItemID == 1047 || newItemID == 1048 || newItemID == 1049 || newItemID == 1050 || newItemID == 1051 || newItemID == 1052 || newItemID == 1053 || newItemID == 1054 || newItemID == 1055 || newItemID == 1056 || newItemID == 1057 || newItemID == 1058 || newItemID == 1037 || newItemID == 1025 || newItemID == 1026) {

				}
				else {
				if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0)
				{
					addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
				}
				else
				{
					sendMessage("No such item.");
				}
			}
			}
			catch(Exception e)
			{
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10");
			}
			
		}

that will make it so they cant spawn any phats, h’ween masks, eye patch and bunny ears. happy?

Read full topic

item.title: How can i ban items from ::ite/::pickup
item.dc:creator: @1_dum_taco 1 dum taco
item.description:
@1_dum_taco wrote:

set the other admisn player rights as 2 annd make pickup a 3 admin only comand so it would look like this

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
try
{
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (newItemID == “insert id here”) {
//this makes it do nothing
}
else {
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0)
{
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
}
else
{
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
}
}
catch(Exception e)
{
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}
}

item.title: How can i ban items from ::ite/::pickup
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

I dont think what your asking is possible because the ::item and the ::pickup command are both string commands so they cant really be “edited”.The only thing to do is delete them OR make spawning for you only.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i ban items from ::ite/::pickup

item.title: How can i ban items from ::ite/::pickup
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

NO! It’s ALLWAYS possible to do stuff like that, don’t lisson to them…all you do is go to pickup and item and put in some coding
like for pickup do

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (newItemID == "insert id here") { //this makes it do nothing } else { if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); } }
don’t lisson to these newbies.

Read full topic
